name: IYTH App v1.3.0
body:
# IYTH App v1.1.0 - App Update Feature

## New Features
- In-app automatic update checking
- Version comparison between local and remote
- Real-time download progress display
- Smart installation after download completion

## How to Use
1. Click 'Check Update' button on main screen
2. Update dialog shows if new version available
3. Click 'Update Now' to start download
4. Installation starts automatically after download

## Technical Improvements
- Integrated OkHttp for network requests
- Android DownloadManager for download management
- FileProvider support for secure installation
- Real-time progress monitoring and status feedback
- Multiple mirror sources for China mainland access

## System Requirements
- Android 5.0 (API 21) or higher
- Internet connection (for update checking)
- About 8MB storage space

## Tech Stack
- Kotlin + Material Design 3
- OkHttp 4.12.0 + Gson 2.10.1
- Android DownloadManager
